channel.title: Iot on Arnaud Bos
channel.description: Recent content in Iot on Arnaud Bos

item.title: Nabaztag/tag internals
item.description: Nabaztag/tag Updated: June 15th, 2016 Created: June 6th, 2016 Object: Detail what’s inside a Nabaztag/tag, with components references when possible. I’m obviously not the first one trying to recycle my Nabaztag. Previous dissections have been done by others so I will reuse what they have done and will keep it here as a reference for my own usage. Most of the information on this page come from this guy, so thank you.

item.title: MR. P â€” Project outline
item.description: Nabaztag/tags Updated: June 15th, 2016 Created: June 5th, 2016 Object: Kick-off of “Mr. P” project for Nabaztag/tag rabbit resurection with a Raspberry Pi. Naming Nabaztag means “rabbit” ; There’s a rabbit whose name is “Mr. Rabbit” in Fantastic Mr. Fox film, which I love ; There’s also a “Mr. Rabbit” in the Utopia TV series, which I’m an absolute fan of ; I’ll use a Raspberry Pi.
